short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A pomodoro that adjusts the rest duration based on your last focus duration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For example, if your default duration are:
     focus = 25 minutes, rest = 5 minutes
and you did focus work for 50 minutes, your next rest duration will be
     rest = (50/25) * 5 = 10 minutes
